response.overview: In late 19th century Hong Kong, the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. Coast Guard officer Dragon Ma is determined that his beloved Coast Guard will not be made a fool of.
response.tagline: Rip-roaring adventure on the old China Coast.
response.title: Project A

titles.title: Os Piratas dos Mares da China

cast.name: Paul Wong Kwan
cast.character: Policeman / Man with Ladder in Alley (uncredited)

results.name: [ Trailer ] A計劃 ( Project A ) - Restored Version
